In that the Chad is the one blackmailed into it, he basically isn't despite being a Host, some big shot in the underworld but a chump who OWES the actual big shots money, that he could have taken the money but decided to rape as a bonus, and is now trapped in a bad situation (oh the woman LOVES fucking him, just more akin to a LIVING sex toy then as a lover! As said before, the things he did and act work well in NTR BECAUSE the writer makes the guy DENSE and the woman COMPLETELY Foolish! But without that protection, the Chad like him is looking to get caught and quite easily too, and the woman will play on the winning team cause she keeps her husband and happy high middle class life and gets revenge for the whole blackmail rape by delivering back on him!
